body:
On windows, use pytest stdout/err capture to avoid conflicting with logger on cmd tests
To Test:
-  `spack unit-test lib\spack\spack\test\cmd\[any modified test file]`

Considerations:
- some tests on Linux explicitly disable pytest capturing - how to handle this? 
- Is there another way to capture output without resorting to redirection?
title: use pytest stdout/err capture
